item.description: That you can include doc-comments in macros: macro_rules! documented { ( $(#[$outer:meta])* $name:ident ) => { $(#[$outer])* fn $name(&self) {} }; } documented!( /// documented my_function ); my_function(); // hovering "function" now shows that the doc-comment is "documented" h/t https://stackoverflow.com/a/33999625/6571327
